reviewText: Great item, quick shipping, great seller, thank you.

This video explains Averell's raid to Salem, Va. in 1863 with great images of the rugged mountain area that the Cavalry had to fight in. It also goes into the history of the formation of the State of West Virginia and follows General William W. Averell's military career and post military life.  If you enjoy reading about the Civil War and want to learn more about the hardships that were involved in fighting in the mountainous regions of West Virginia, this is a great film.
